page.title: 08DURSLEY SCHOOLS SPORTS
page.content: In 1985 the 31st Annual Sports Meeting of the Dursley and District Primary Schools was held at the playing fields of Dursley Primary School. More than 200 competitors, representing twelve schools in the area, compete every year in an established event which is greatly enjoyed by competitors and spectators. Throwing, running and jumping events for boys and girls aged 7-11 years provide an opportunity for the children ro represent their in friendly competition. Trophies are awarded to winning relay teams and all competitors receive a certificate to acknowledge their participation in the Sports. Annual Rounders, Netball, Cricket and Football Tournaments and a Swimming Gala are organised.
